posts.title: Wisconsin teen allegedly killed parents in extremist plot to assassinate Trump, FBI says
top_comments:
hearing the story on the news yesterday was wild because each sentence just got weirder than the last 😭

1. killed his parents

2. plots against trump

3. wrote a manifesto discussing plans to take over america

4. loved hitler and wants a new order of neo nazism
They conveniently leave the other half of the headline out. That he wanted to kill Trump to start a race war.

>The sheriff's department issued a search warrant and say they found material on the teen's phone related to "The Order of Nine Angles," which is "a network of individuals holding new-Nazi racially motivated extremist views," according to investigators.

Why can't we say "gang"? If 'a network of individuals' isn't gang or a mob then what is it? Call them an anti-american Nazi gang.

It’s crazy how many of these mass shooters fall into white nationalism rabbit holes. 

I watched Frontline’s documentary on Terrorgram, and it’s really scary how effective it is playing out in real time.
These headlines keep leaving of the white supremacist part.

"Wisconsin NEO-NAZI & WHITE SUPREMACIST killed parents, aspired to assassination and instigate a race war."

- Fixed the title for you
Interesting that all those who have plotted to kill him so far have been fellow right-wingers.
What a disgusting moron.
This officially might be the craziest shit I’ve seen this year
Every single time this story is presented the Media refuses to also mention that he is a Neo-Nazi.

posts.title: DHS Mistakenly tells attorney US Citizen to leave the US
top_comments:
NPR last week interviewed a US attorney who is a US citizen, and he said the Trump administration is targeting US immigration attorneys. He was coming back from vacation and crossed the border checkpoint.That is when border patrol targeted him and detained him, then tried to confiscate his phone. They told him he was on a list for terrorists. He told them he had over ten years of attorney client privilege communications on his phone.  He told them absolutely not in confiscating his phone.  He said there are other immigration attorneys he personally knows that are also being harrassed by ICE and border patrol.
https://www.npr.org/2025/04/09/nx-s1-5357455/attorney-detained-by-immigration-authorities
This isn’t a mistake it’s a trial balloon

>Mistakenly

Yeah, I’m sure it was. No veiled threats here, guys.

*CBP used the known email addresses of the alien to send notifications. If a non-personal email-such as an American citizen contact-was provided by the alien, notices may have been sent to unintended recipients.*

Yep, totally explains why the American citizen contact was the only one named in the notice. Sure guys, makes total sense.
An immigration attorney….seems suspicious.
It's ridiculous that they think sending an email is adequate for such communication, even if it were legit. "Oh, it went to your spam, so you didn't see it? Well, it's off to El Salvador for you."

What dehumanizing language

 “ CBP used the known email addresses of the alien to send notifications. If a non-personal email-such as an American citizen contact-was provided by the alien, notices may have been sent to unintended recipients”
Quick question - where the fuck would a native born US citizen with no connections to any other nation go?
I have a bridge to sell you if you think it was a mistake

Mistakenly telling people to leave. Mistakenly deporting people. Mistakenly firing people. 
Mistakenly doing Nazi salutes

posts.title: FAA says company whose sightseeing chopper crashed, killing 6, is ceasing operations immediately
top_comments: The company has had some accidents in the past.  But you have to figure that losing the rotors in flight has to be a blatant maintenance failure.

That was fast. Guess they don’t have big lawyer money?

Or is it easy enough to shutdown this company with a bad reputation, then the owners open a new one in a couple years?

A video I saw on the  YouTube channel seemed to show the rotor with the transmission still attached. If that is correct then it wasn’t the Jesus nut.
Edit 1. Broncolirio YouTube channel.
Can they avoid a civil suit by dissolving the company?

It's just awful to see this happen, particularly given that the article points out five helicopters have fallen into the rivers in recent years, and the situation is made worse because attempts to restrict these flights haven't really succeeded, I mean, it's something we need to really address, but apparently it's been a difficult fight... and to be honest, it's just sad that something like this keeps happening.

How about we let the NTSB do the investigation instead of speculating? Too many people have no idea what the fuck they're talking about, just throwing words out like Jesus Nut, FDR, and Mast Bumping. You can't know the exact point of failure and why it failed based off a grainy 10 second video. Stop spreading misinformation.
Hard to run chopper tours without a chopper. They might be short a pilot, too.
Soon to open under a new and untarnished name:(
well, yeah, they don't have a chopper.
Without the internet, I might have gotten into a helicopter one day. Now, that is never happening.

posts.title: China Halts Critical Exports as Trade War Intensifies
top_comments:
>The metals, and special magnets made with them, can now be shipped out of China only with special export licenses.

>But China has barely started setting up a system for issuing the licenses. That has caused consternation among industry executives that the process could drag on and that current supplies of minerals and products outside of China could run low.

And I'm betting they're in no great hurry.
Has Trump tried tariffing 1000%? Maybe that'll do it.
Thanks, as always, Trump. Always finding new and exciting ways to fuck everyone over.
Any entry-level frat boy at a hedgie would be gone by now, and replaced.
China probably had always wanted to restrict these exports and now have a very good legitimate reason for doing so. DJT totally played into their hands.
trump, playing 1-D chess
They’ll sell it somewhere else.

It's almost funny that Trump THINKS he can try to fuck up other countries expecting them to not retaliate.
USA doesn't produce everything it consumes. In fact, if every country stopped selling everything to USA, it would crumble. Maybe that should be a plan...
China is beating the felon to a pulp. He’s no match for them and neither are his advisors.
How long before the american public feels these effects? I wanna see the shocked pikachu faces of the trump supporters when they’re badly hit by all this

posts.title: Photojournalist witnesses Venezuelan migrants' arrival in El Salvador: "They had no idea what was coming"
top_comments:
Can someone explain to me why El Salvador (the government, not the people,) is taking these people?? Is it JUST money?? Are they trying to be on the administrations good side?? 

I am sincerely asking.

**Edit: Got my answer; thanks.**
When you thought WWII internment camps weren't bad enough, this administration was sure they could bring us to a new, shameful low point.

If those Venezuelans committed no crimes against El Salvador, what justification do they have to detain them?

Trump said he had no power over them once they left US jurisdiction; so, the USA is effectively selling slaves again. 

Somehow, there should be a class action for the 13th Amendment. No judge sentenced them to indentured servitude for a crime.
Im seriously sitting here crying….how tf do we help these people? Nobody deserves this 😭

There is no way to spin this, this is plain and simple terrorism for someone's pleasure.  This is sick and we will never be able to unsee this abuse of power. The people that instigated this and participate in this atrocity are the ones that belong in prison.

>As Holsinger snapped the last few photographs, he felt that he had just watched the Venezuelan men become "ghosts." 

>"They've been stripped of their hair and their clothes… It's like your life just ceased to exist. You're just a person in white clothes now," Holsinger said. 

>"And it was a sense of watching people disappear."

As a photography lover, these photos are extraordinary. 

As a human, the above quote is haunting. We are all sitting by and watching people being deported to concentration camps. With absolute zero resistance to it.

Can someone tell me what we can do now? What can we actually do to stop this? Is it too late?

It is a concentration camp.


Someone please call it was it is. The guards are literally yelling "Fast! Fast! Fast".



The guards at the camps during World War II yelled "Schnell! Schnell! Schnell!"

The nazis tried to destroy the evidence of the crimes they committed at the concentration camps, and now the US and El Salvador are openly showing their crimes to the world in high definition. We learn nothing.
Americans sending innocent people to gulags, not wanting to lose their treats or have the slightest inconvenience. Bread and circuses..
Those bunks pictured in the article are straight out of nazi concentration camps. Just made of metal instead of wood. History and human beings suck

posts.title: SSA shifts to X posts for official messaging after cuts to communications staff
top_comments: Lots of middle aged people gonna be getting calls from their elderly parents asking wtf is X

And you can’t read messages without an account, thus sharing your private information with and boosting the subscriber count of a social media company privately owned by the person who ordered the change in policy. This country is fucked.
Why is a private company, twitter, the official announcement portal of a public benefit? This is silly.
Absolutely zero conflict of interest with that
Is this a plan to funnel more older people into a right wing echo chamber?
Because people over 65 use Twitter so much.
X/Twitter is a failing/failed network that needs to be propped up, so of course Mr Musk was going to demand a forced audience. Just another example of corporate welfare.
[deleted]

Unless they're seriously trying to get a whole bunch of elderly people to use X for direct communications and such, somebody should just set up a bot to immediately repost any of their X posts to the various non-Nazi networks.
Going to take decades to even start to fix this crap. If ever.

posts.title: Suspect in custody after overnight fire at Pennsylvania Gov. Josh Shapiro's residence
top_comments: Fits the bill of a domestic terrorist.
So this person will be charged federally with domestic terrorism, right? Or is that only if you vandalize a Tesla?
What does he think the governor has to do with foreclosures?

Supposedly angry about his property being seized and auctioned off.  

https://www.timesnownews.com/world/us/us-news/was-cody-balmer-upset-with-gov-josh-shapiro-over-property-seizure-court-document-surfaces-article-151411593
I’m sort of relieved that this guy is just your normal run of the mill asshole. I was expecting the worst.
It’s called arson, or attempted murder. Overnight fire just downplays what took place
everyone is so quick to attach their pet cause to the reason (the arsonist must be anti-israel, maga, trans, etc.) and it ends up being some dude who has a personal beef. Go figure.

Domestic terrorism. Its funny how Trump supporters do dumb shit that conflicts with what Trump says. One of his own patriots is a pedophile. Another tried to kill a cop. Patriots indeed, colonel sanders.

Add hate crime.  

Done on Passover in the same room as the Seder. 

Be sure to hit him with multiple STATE crimes too so Trump can’t pardon him.
Was it mostly peaceful?

posts.title: Police: Someone set fire to Pennsylvania governor's residence; no one was injured
top_comments:
> In a statement, Shapiro, viewed as a potential White House contender for the Democratic Party in 2028, said he and his family woke up at about 2 a.m. to bangs on the door from the Pennsylvania State Police after the fire broke out.

This could have ended horrifically, and makes me think there was more to this than just a case of arson. I mean, wow.

EDIT: It's occurred to me after speaking with some other redditors that this building would have had on-site security, so not only will someone probably be getting fired, but they were more safe than I initially assumed. 

Still, this isn't great.

> The Harrisburg Bureau of Fire was called to the residence and, while they worked to put out the fire, police evacuated Shapiro and his family from the residence safely, Shapiro said.
"Thank God no one was injured and the fire was extinguished,” Shapiro said in a statement.

I think the statement: someone tried to kill the Governor and his family is more accurate. So glad he and his loved ones are alright.
On Passover weekend, too. I believe he is Jewish.
It may or may not be coincidence, but Saturday was the first night of Passover.
Happened to a Jewish governor as he and his family were sleeping after celebrating Passover in the evening. First conclusion in my head is hate crime.
US Domestic terrorists are certainly emboldened and have been in the last 10 years. I don’t see an end soon, but hope for one.
Where were the security forces?

With the way society is today, it could be:

1. QAnon wacko hating a Jewish governor for Passover because of "jews in power".

2. Racist variant of the pro-Palestine / anti-Israel supporters who justify hate against all jews, on Passover.

3. Something just sparked, and the security found out late.

I'm sure Barbie Bondi will be on the case with the same zeal as if someone urinated on the tire of a Tesla.

/s

First night of Passover for a Jewish governor and his family…


This was definitely a hate crime

posts.title: China’s Xi tells Spanish PM that partnership needed, no mention of talks with US
top_comments:
*U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent called out Spain for its move toward China, saying on Tuesday that Spain — or any country that tries to get closer to China — would be “cutting their own throat” because Chinese manufacturers will be looking to dump goods that they can’t sell in the U.S.*

While other countries pursue cooperation during this trade chaos, the imperial Bessent talks of "cutting throats" and refers to Chinese shipments to Europe as "dumping."
The current US President found a way to make Xi look reasonable and statesmanlike. New achievement unlocked.
Art of the deal! Make everyone angry against you so they make deals behind your back.
If EU members can't work with the US, they'll work with someone else.
I would say that China is stealing all of the US's soft power, but that would imply that the US didn't abandon their soft power on the side of the road in the middle of nowhere.
Apprently in China they call Trump “Country Builder” because everytime he does something to them it unites China and make them stronger lol
Well I mean if the US wants to isolate itself to the degree that it's acting like there really isn't a reason to ever talk to the US for anything other than "get your airbase out of my country".
EU, Latin America, Canada, Asia joining forces would shut the bully up for good, permanently.
Good Olde Uncle Donnie, busy making America so great, the world is quickly leaving us so far behind, the dust bowl is starting to sound appealing.
I don't like Xi, but at least he doesn't insult the EU on a daily basis. The bar is THAT low nowadays.

posts.title: King's College scientists' lab-grown human teeth breakthrough
top_comments:
Unfortunately teeth are considered luxury bones depending on where you live. Damaged teeth are an immense source of constant stress, pain, and focus for people with those issues and with Americans mostly living paycheck to paycheck, you can guess how it affects them constantly when coupled with the lower standards for food, further leading to tooth damage.

I hope I live long enough to see this matter, but I feel I'll just see this breakthrough forced into obscurity.

What happened to that Japanese treatment that makes a nerve in your gums start to grow a tooth?

While terrifying, it did seem like a major thing if factual.
New set of teeth in 24 hours!
Why is this pop up always there pestering me to REGISTERRRRR
Can we regrow hair yet or am I more likely growing teeth on my scalp?

So I can finally have the built-in castanets I’ve always dreamed of?! 

My flamenco routine is gonna be GREAT
We’ll never hear about it again for at least 11 years. For commonality, that is. -THE HS.

posts.title: Photojournalist witnesses Venezuelan migrants' arrival in El Salvador: "They had no idea what was coming"
top_comments:

>As Holsinger snapped the last few photographs, he felt that he had just watched the Venezuelan men become "ghosts." 

>"They've been stripped of their hair and their clothes… It's like your life just ceased to exist. You're just a person in white clothes now," Holsinger said. 

>"And it was a sense of watching people disappear."

As a photography lover, these photos are extraordinary. 

As a human, the above quote is haunting. We are all sitting by and watching people being deported to concentration camps. With absolute zero resistance to it.

Can someone tell me what we can do now? What can we actually do to stop this? Is it too late?

The guards at the camps during World War II yelled "Schnell! Schnell! Schnell!"

posts.title: DHS Mistakenly tells attorney US Citizen to leave the US
top_comments:
NPR last week interviewed a US attorney who is a US citizen, and he said the Trump administration is targeting US immigration attorneys. He was coming back from vacation and crossed the border checkpoint.That is when border patrol targeted him and detained him, then tried to confiscate his phone. They told him he was on a list for terrorists. He told them he had over ten years of attorney client privilege communications on his phone.  He told them absolutely not in confiscating his phone.  He said there are other immigration attorneys he personally knows that are also being harrassed by ICE and border patrol.
https://www.npr.org/2025/04/09/nx-s1-5357455/attorney-detained-by-immigration-authorities
This isn’t a mistake it’s a trial balloon

>Mistakenly

Yeah, I’m sure it was. No veiled threats here, guys.

*CBP used the known email addresses of the alien to send notifications. If a non-personal email-such as an American citizen contact-was provided by the alien, notices may have been sent to unintended recipients.*

Yep, totally explains why the American citizen contact was the only one named in the notice. Sure guys, makes total sense.
An immigration attorney….seems suspicious.
It's ridiculous that they think sending an email is adequate for such communication, even if it were legit. "Oh, it went to your spam, so you didn't see it? Well, it's off to El Salvador for you."

What dehumanizing language

 “ CBP used the known email addresses of the alien to send notifications. If a non-personal email-such as an American citizen contact-was provided by the alien, notices may have been sent to unintended recipients”
Quick question - where the fuck would a native born US citizen with no connections to any other nation go?
